DOC.detailed_description: A clinical study 26 patient , age 50-69 year , healthy unless osteoarthritis one hip , randomize four group plus reference group 26 patient´s contralateral healthy hip . Intervention surgery total hip arthroplasty . The studied endoprosthetic component : Cemented Lubinus SP II stem ceramic 32 mm head , cement Lubinus cross link cup ( Waldemar Link , Hamburg , Germany ) . Palacose cement gentamycin , apply 3 : rd generation cementation technique use cemented implant . Uncemented HA-coated Corail stem ceramic 32 mm head ( DePuy , Johnson & Johnson , USA ) , fibrous metal Regenerex RingLoc cup ( Biomet , Warsaw , Il , USA ) All cup cross link Ultra-high-molecular-weight polyethylene ( UHWMP ) .
